title: (x) Experience Bliss - ITC Edwardian Script {Paul, Patricia}
content:
Can anyone ID this font? Thanks.

author: DjArcadian

comments.content: ITC Edwardian Script with some funky Photoshop junk applied (including stretching which is just as bad as [squooshing](http://web.archive.org/wiki/squooshed)). Itâ€™s currently the font of the month at [http://itcfonts.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20060518231714/http:/itcfonts.com/).

Edwardian Script Alternate I think.

http://www.fontshop.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=catalog.fontdetail&displayfontid=LH.9256.0.2&attributes.sampleSize=48&sampleText=Experience+Bliss&sampleSize=48

with a stroke perhaps.
